title: Konkona Sen sharma: Elated with 'Talvar' success
text:
Talvar has been making the right noises ever since its release last week and the film's lead star, actress Konkona Sen sharma says she is happy to see the response that the thriller has been getting.
READ: Konkona Sen Sharma: Irrfan Khan can have good chemistry with anyone
The Meghna Gulzar-directed film is inspired by the sensational murder of 14-year-old Aarushi Talwar and 45-year-old Hemraj Banjade, a domestic help in Noida, India in 2008. It sees the 35-year-old actress play the role inspired by Nupur Talwar, Aarushi's mother, who has been convicted for her child's murder with husband Rajesh.
 updates,
"I am happy with the response that the film has been getting. It is a very good feeling. I hope more people go and watch it," Konkona said on the sidelines of Amazon India Fashion Week. The mystery drama depicts how politics, professional rivalries and media coverage can influence the course of justice. It highlights the flaws in India's criminal justice system, and the prejudices and limitations of the people running it.
